00049 /***************************************************************************/
00056 void VCMP_Init(const VCMP_Init_TypeDef *vcmpInit)
00057 {
00058   /* Verify input */
00059   EFM_ASSERT((vcmpInit->inactive == 0) || (vcmpInit->inactive == 1));
00060   EFM_ASSERT((vcmpInit->biasProg >= 0) && (vcmpInit->biasProg < 16));
00061 
00062   /* Configure Half Bias setting */
00063   if (vcmpInit->halfBias)
00064   {
00065     VCMP->CTRL |= VCMP_CTRL_HALFBIAS;
00066   }
00067   else
00068   {
00069     VCMP->CTRL &= ~(VCMP_CTRL_HALFBIAS);
00070   }
00071 
00072   /* Configure bias prog */
00073   VCMP->CTRL &= ~(_VCMP_CTRL_BIASPROG_MASK);
00074   VCMP->CTRL |= (vcmpInit->biasProg << _VCMP_CTRL_BIASPROG_SHIFT);
00075 
00076   /* Configure sense for falling edge */
00077   if (vcmpInit->irqFalling)
00078   {
00079     VCMP->CTRL |= VCMP_CTRL_IFALL;
00080   }
00081   else
00082   {
00083     VCMP->CTRL &= ~(VCMP_CTRL_IFALL);
00084   }
00085 
00086   /* Configure sense for rising edge */
00087   if (vcmpInit->irqRising)
00088   {
00089     VCMP->CTRL |= VCMP_CTRL_IRISE;
00090   }
00091   else
00092   {
00093     VCMP->CTRL &= ~(VCMP_CTRL_IRISE);
00094   }
00095 
00096   /* Configure warm-up time */
00097   VCMP->CTRL &= ~(_VCMP_CTRL_WARMTIME_MASK);
00098   VCMP->CTRL |= (vcmpInit->warmup << _VCMP_CTRL_WARMTIME_SHIFT);
00099 
00100   /* Configure hysteresis */
00101   switch (vcmpInit->hyst)
00102   {
00103     case vcmpHyst20mV:
00104       VCMP->CTRL |= VCMP_CTRL_HYSTEN;
00105       break;
00106     case vcmpHystNone:
00107       VCMP->CTRL &= ~(VCMP_CTRL_HYSTEN);
00108       break;
00109     default:
00110       break;
00111   }
00112 
00113   /* Configure inactive output value */
00114   VCMP->CTRL |= (vcmpInit->inactive << _VCMP_CTRL_INACTVAL_SHIFT);
00115 
00116   /* Configure trigger level */
00117   VCMP_TriggerSet(vcmpInit->triggerLevel);
00118 
00119   /* Enable or disable VCMP */
00120   if (vcmpInit->enable)
00121   {
00122     VCMP->CTRL |= VCMP_CTRL_EN;
00123   }
00124   else
00125   {
00126     VCMP->CTRL &= ~(VCMP_CTRL_EN);
00127   }
00128 
00129   /* If Low Power Reference is enabled, wait until VCMP is ready */
00130   /* before enabling it, see reference manual for deatils        */
00131   /* Configuring Low Power Ref without enable has no effect      */
00132   if(vcmpInit->lowPowerRef && vcmpInit->enable)
00133   {
00134     /* Poll for VCMP ready */
00135     while(!VCMP_Ready());
00136     VCMP_LowPowerRefSet(vcmpInit->lowPowerRef);
00137   }
00138 
00139   /* Clear edge interrupt */
00140   VCMP_IntClear(VCMP_IF_EDGE);
00141 }
00142 
00143 
00144 /***************************************************************************/
00151 void VCMP_LowPowerRefSet(bool enable)
00152 {
00153   if (enable)
00154   {
00155     VCMP->INPUTSEL |= VCMP_INPUTSEL_LPREF;
00156   }
00157   else
00158   {
00159     VCMP->INPUTSEL &= ~VCMP_INPUTSEL_LPREF;
00160   }
00161 }
00162 
00163 
00164 /***************************************************************************/
00171 void VCMP_TriggerSet(int level)
00172 {
00173   /* Trigger range is 6 bits, value from 0-63 */
00174   EFM_ASSERT((level > 0) && (level < 64));
00175 
00176   /* Set trigger level */
00177   VCMP->INPUTSEL = (VCMP->INPUTSEL & ~(_VCMP_INPUTSEL_TRIGLEVEL_MASK))
00178                    | (level << _VCMP_INPUTSEL_TRIGLEVEL_SHIFT);
00179 }
